___template-url.description: URL to tarball containing a directory templates/ to customize haproxy config.

___haproxy-map.description: Enable HAProxy VHost maps for fast VHost routing.

___container-syslogd.description: Enable verbose syslogd logging to container stdout. This will also capture all HAProxy http connection and other logs.

___ssl-cert.description: TLS Cert and private key for HTTPS.

___role.description: Deploy marathon-lb only on nodes with this role.

___reload-interval.description: When retry-reload enabled, wait this long before attempting another reload.

___bind-http-https.description: Reserve ports 80 and 443 for the LB. Use this if you intend to use virtual hosts.

___auto-assign-service-ports.description: Auto assign service ports for tasks which use IP-per-task. See https://github.com/mesosphere/marathon-lb#mesos-with-ip-per-task-support for details.

___sysctl-params.default: net.ipv4.tcp_tw_reuse=1 net.ipv4.tcp_fin_timeout=30 net.ipv4.tcp_max_syn_backlog=10240 net.ipv4.tcp_max_tw_buckets=400000 net.ipv4.tcp_max_orphans=60000 net.core.somaxconn=10000
___sysctl-params.description: sysctl params to set at startup for HAProxy.

___strict-mode.description: Enable strict mode. This requires that you explicitly enable each backend with `HAPROXY_{n}_ENABLED=true`.

___mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to each marathon-lb task.

___haproxy-group.description: HAProxy group parameter. Matches with HAPROXY_GROUP in the app labels.

___secret_name.description: Name of the Secret Store credentials to use for DC/OS service authentication. This should be left empty unless service authentication is needed.

___max-reload-retries.description: Max reload retries before failure. Reloads happen every --reload-interval seconds. Set to 0 to disable or -1 for infinite retries.

___cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each marathon-lb instance.
